task.title: 050 (Library of Congress Call Number)
task.shortdesc: Classification or call number that is taken from Library of Congress Classification or LC Classification Additions and Changes.

context.codeblock: --- examples: # Voyager BIB IDs for testing - [4, 236, 907498] input: - 050$a trim: - punctuation - whitespace strip: - punctuation - preserve: - period

substep.cmd: Replace any punctuation characters that are not a period (.) with a whitespace character.
